entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
